entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
